snippet: There was no sign of progress in separate talks between Sheik Ahmad Moaz al-Khatib and American and Russian officials at a conference in Munich.
abstract: Syrian opposition leader Sheik Ahmad Moaz al-Khatib meets with representatives of United States and Russia, but separate meetings show no signs of progress toward plan to end violence in Syria.

byline.contributor: Mark Landler contributed reporting from Washington, and Hwaida Saad and Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: There was no sign of progress in separate talks between Sheik Ahmad Moaz al-Khatib and American and Russian officials at a conference in Munich.

headline.seo: Syrian Opposition Leader Confers With U.S. and Russia
